title: Friday Post Show (04-16-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (04-16-21)
description:
Bobby on doing the show from a bedroom in Los Angeles and not having to travel for a month. Bobby talks about a gambling site that has adjust its line on confirming existence in 2021. Bobby connects it to uncontacted tribes and how that could actually be us. Bobby also shares a story about a guy who proposed with 5 rings and how Eddie is wearing fingernail polish all next week. We also get an update on Mike D’s wedding and what he’s most nervous about. Raymundo also thinks a country artist wrote a song about him…

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
